segments.text: I'm struck by the sheer normalcy of the woman's actions, drying her plate with such care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the world around her is slowly descending into chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is just inches away from her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the precarious cookie heist happening just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little bubble of domestic tranquility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden visible through the window makes the internal disarray even more apparent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything outside is calm and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, water is spreading and a child is risking a fall for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such an odd juxtaposition of events.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a little sad for the mess she's going to discover.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this effort she's putting into drying dishes will be negated by the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what her reaction will be.
segments.speaker: PAR
